name: Coral Complex
description:
Coral Complex is a floating island management game. 

You will need to manage and resolve crises during the story mode.

Or you can create your island as you want, in sandbox mode.

The game is very oriented around the environmental impact of the actions.

It will manage both satisfaction, electricity and pollution.

Context :      2nd Year School Project

Platform :     PC

Engine :       Unreal Engine 4

Language :  Blueprints

3D :              Maya - Photoshop

Task :          UI Designer - 3D Artist - Programmer

Duration :    12 Weeks

Team size : 11
